summary: This document is an email chain discussing the potential expert testimony of Dr. Dawn Hughes in the United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell case. A federal prosecutor contacts Dr. Hughes to discuss her availability to testify at the trial scheduled for July 2021.

persons.name: Dawn Hughes
persons.context: Dr. Dawn Hughes is contacted by a federal prosecutor to discuss her potential availability to testify as an expert witness in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is the defendant in the case 'United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell', which is the subject of the email discussing expert testimony.

connections.description: Dr. Hughes is being contacted to potentially serve as an expert witness in the federal criminal trial against Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Scheduled Trial Date for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: The trial for United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell is scheduled to begin.

events.title: Email Discussion on Expert Testimony
events.description: A federal prosecutor emails Dr. Dawn Hughes to discuss her potential availability as an expert witness in the Maxwell trial.

keyFacts: The trial for United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell was scheduled for July 12, 2021.
Federal prosecutors were seeking expert testimony from forensic psychologist Dr. Dawn Hughes for the trial.
The email correspondence shows the prosecution's preparation phase for the Maxwell trial in late 2020.
Dr. Hughes indicated availability for a discussion on the matter.
